difficulty.title: Why is Dark Souls 3 first boss so hard? - NCESC
difficulty.body: The first boss in Dark Souls 3, Iudex Gundyr, is considered difficult for several reasons. Firstly, he subverts expectations by having multiple phases and a complex attack pattern. ... The difficulty of this boss sets the tone for the rest of the game and prepares players for the challenges to come. What makes Iudex Gundyr challenging?

strategy.title: How To Beat Iudex Gundyr in Dark Souls 3 (Ultimate Guide)
strategy.body: Iudex Gundyr is the first boss in Dark Souls 3 and is not an optional boss.He has to be defeated in order to access the Firelink Shrine.. Strategies for Defeating Iudex Gundyr.
